column1: Smoque BBQ////Heaven in my mouth. Favorite BBQ place on Earth. I always get chopped brisket sandwich and their gumbo is to die for. I leave there literally in pain from the amount of food I eat it's not even okay
column2: it's perfect. Little pricey but you get what you pay for quality is everything. They give you 2 sauces I recommend the thicker one. Mac and cheese is on point too
